verbs.description: [V: running] [ARG1: to the middle] and away from cuomo democrats in new york are used to being tied to gov andrew m cuomo especially in parts of the state where the two - term incumbent is unpopular but republicans fighting for a capital region state senate seat have upped the ante this campaign season brunswick democrat aaron gladd was recently elevated to the governor family earning the nickname aaron cuomo from his opponent halfmoon republican daphne jordan senate democratic senate campaign committee senate district democrats daphne jordan united states senate cuomo administration senate republican campaign committee league of women voters gladd new york andrew cuomo aaron gladd cuomo gov andrew m cuomo
